DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy on-demand therapy CDFR0812-15/25mg CDFR0812-15/50mg compare on-demand therapy single-drug administration Clomipramine HCl 15mg Korean Male Patients Diagnosed Premature Ejaculation
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study On-demand Therapy With Clomipramine Sildenafil Combination Premature Ejaculation
DOC.detailed_description: Clomipramine dibenzazepine-derivative tricyclic antidepressant ( TCA ) potent inhibitor serotonin norepinephrine reuptake . Clomipramine may use variety indication . Condencia Tab contain low dose 15mg clomipramine HCl active ingredient , newly approve market treatment premature ejaculation . This study prospective , randomize , double-blinded , active-control , 3-treatment arm , parallel , multi-center clinical trial . Approximately total 297 male patient diagnosed premature ejaculation enrol randomized 3 group ( 99 subject per group ) . The efficacy oral administration Clomipramine HCl investigate closely compare effect oral administration CDFR0812-15/25mg CDFR0812-15/50mg . The secondary object investigate general safety oral administration CDFR0812-15/25mg CDFR0812-15/50mg .
DOC.criteria: Korean male age 19 65 Both patient partner give inform write consent Patient persist least 6 month willing retain relationship study Patient diagnose premature ejaculation accord DSMV Patient whose score PEDT ( Korean version ) 11 Patient willing try 4 intercourse attempt Runin period experience 75 % 100 % IELT within one minute le vaginal penetration Patient whose personal distress PEP 'moderate ' . Patient willing participate study end cooperative ( try 4 intercourse attempt visit able postpone schedule elective surgery ) Patient willing complete patient diary questionnaire Patient medical history include neurological disorder , infectious disease , damage , surgery medication history judge related premature ejaculation Patient participate trial within 90 day study Patient unstable medical condition alcohol/drug abuse recent 6 month Patient whose female partner less interested sexual intercourse sexual disorder Patient whose female partner pregnant Patient whose female partner childbearing age willing use proper birth control Patient whose IIEFEF score 25 less Medical history convulsive disease , mental disease , E.C.T ( Electroconvulsive shock Treatment ) , glaucoma Patient take concomitantly prohibit medicine study willing stop medication appropriate washout period
